name: Shopify Campaigns
description: A new feature in the Shopify Admin that allows users to track multichannel marketing campaigns in a single place.

name: infinifractal
description: A multithreaded Mandlebrot set fractal generator. Accessible both as a native application and as a website through WebAssembly.

name: UBC Calendar by Term
description: A Chrome extension that allows users to filter their courses in the UBC course calendar down by term.

name: WestPeak Research Website
description: A website for WestPeak Research Association displaying published research reports done by members and information about the club.

name: EncryptDecrypt
description: An iOS app that educates users the concept of encryption, particularly the Diffie-Hellman key exchange algorithm, through an interactive interface.
